text: The Rat Race is a 1960 American romantic comedy-drama movie directed by Robert Mulligan and was based on the play by Garson Kanin. It stars Tony Curtis, Debbie Reynolds, Jack Oakie, Kay Medford, Don Rickles, Norman Fell, Marjorie Bennett and was distributed by Paramount Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1960 romantic comedy movies Category:1960 romantic drama movies Category:1960 comedy-drama movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by Robert Mulligan Category:Paramount Pictures movies
title: The Rat Race
